languages.text: "Твоя маленькая ведьма мне не чета. Она походит на испорченный вокс — бездумно осыпает тебя образами и шумом, не умея улавливать среди них Истину. Потешно, но не более того".
"Your paltry witch is beneath me. She is a broken vox that spews images and noise, unable to discern the Truth among them. An amusing sight, but that is all."
languages.original_text: "Твоя маленькая ведьма мне не чета. Она походит на испорченный вокс — бездумно осыпает тебя образами и шумом, не умея улавливать среди них Истину. Потешно, но не более того".

traits.locale_text: "Your paltry witch is beneath me. She is a broken vox that spews images and noise, unable to discern the Truth among them. An amusing sight, but that is all."

"Your paltry witch is beneath me. She is a broken vox that spews images and noise, unable to discern the Truth among them. An amusing sight, but that is all."

languages.text: « Votre sorcière à la manque ne m'arrive pas à la cheville. Ce n'est qu'un vox brisé qui crachote du bruit et des images, sans pouvoir en discerner la vérité cachée. Un spectacle qui prête à rire, certes, mais ça s'arrête là. »
languages.original_text: "Your paltry witch is beneath me. She is a broken vox that spews images and noise, unable to discern the Truth among them. An amusing sight, but that is all."

traits.locale_text: « Votre sorcière à la manque ne m'arrive pas à la cheville. Ce n'est qu'un vox brisé qui crachote du bruit et des images, sans pouvoir en discerner la vérité cachée. Un spectacle qui prête à rire, certes, mais ça s'arrête là. »

languages.text: «Tu insignificante bruja no es comparable conmigo. Es un voco roto que escupe imágenes y ruido, incapaz de distinguir la Verdad subyacente. Es entretenida de ver, pero nada más».
languages.original_text: "Your paltry witch is beneath me. She is a broken vox that spews images and noise, unable to discern the Truth among them. An amusing sight, but that is all."

traits.locale_text: «Tu insignificante bruja no es comparable conmigo. Es un voco roto que escupe imágenes y ruido, incapaz de distinguir la Verdad subyacente. Es entretenida de ver, pero nada más».

languages.text: 「お前の哀れな魔女は私の足元にも及ばぬ。彼女はイメージとノイズを撒き散らしており、その中から真実を見極めることもできぬ壊れた通信機のようなものだ。見た目は面白いが、それだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Your paltry witch is beneath me. She is a broken vox that spews images and noise, unable to discern the Truth among them. An amusing sight, but that is all."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の哀れな魔女は私の足元にも及ばぬ。彼女はイメージとノイズを撒き散らしており、その中から真実を見極めることもできぬ壊れた通信機のようなものだ。見た目は面白いが、それだけだ」

languages.text: “你那可怜的女巫根本不配与我相提并论。她不过是个坏了的音阵装置，只会吐出图像与噪音，无法辨认其中的真理。这很有趣，但也仅此而已。”
languages.original_text: "Your paltry witch is beneath me. She is a broken vox that spews images and noise, unable to discern the Truth among them. An amusing sight, but that is all."

traits.locale_text: “你那可怜的女巫根本不配与我相提并论。她不过是个坏了的音阵装置，只会吐出图像与噪音，无法辨认其中的真理。这很有趣，但也仅此而已。”

languages.text: "Eure armselige Hexe ist unter meiner Würde. Sie gleicht einem defekten Vox, das Bilder und Geräusche ausspuckt, aber die Wahrheit darin nicht erkennt. Ein amüsanter Anblick, mehr nicht."
languages.original_text: "Your paltry witch is beneath me. She is a broken vox that spews images and noise, unable to discern the Truth among them. An amusing sight, but that is all."

traits.locale_text: "Eure armselige Hexe ist unter meiner Würde. Sie gleicht einem defekten Vox, das Bilder und Geräusche ausspuckt, aber die Wahrheit darin nicht erkennt. Ein amüsanter Anblick, mehr nicht."

languages.text: "Kıymetsiz cadın benim kalibremde değil. O bozuk bir voks gibi. Görseller ve sesler çıkarıyor ama aralarında neyin Hakikat olduğunu ayırt edemiyor. Gülünç ama o kadar işte."
languages.original_text: "Your paltry witch is beneath me. She is a broken vox that spews images and noise, unable to discern the Truth among them. An amusing sight, but that is all."
